p:
As we apply these community mitigation strategies on a global level that has never been seen before in human history, future evaluation will determine their effect on the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic. Tracheostomy was an essential clinical strategy for managing epidemics associated with respiratory failure during the 20th century, including those of poliomyelitis and diptheria,
4 and we hope that the careful conduct and management of tracheostomy during the current pandemic will help to reduce the impact of COVID-19.
